attributes.action: Review Low stake gambling stakes in Pubs and Clubs.
attributes.additional_details: The current limits are out of date.
attributes.background: Since 2005 the limit has been £5 in pubs and £10 in clubs. This should be reviewed  and adjusted in line with inflation.

rejection.details: Decisions about gambling stakes in pubs and clubs are a matter for the Gambling Commission, not the UK Government or Parliament.
